section.title: Resizing Tracks
section.para: The height of a track in the &TRACK_DISPLAY; can be resized by right-clicking in the empty space in the &TRACK_CONTROLS; to bring up the track context menu and choosing a size from the Height submenu.
It can also be modified by clicking on the h button in the &TRACK_CONTROLS; when the size of the track is Normal or above.

tip.para: Holding the pointer over a track and pressing Shift while scrolling with the mouse wheel will increase or decrease its height.
